name: karaoke
description: Karaoke built with Web Audio API

scripts.build: npm run build:scripts -s && npm run build:styles -s && npm run build:markup -s && npm run build:static -s
scripts.build:static: mkdir -p build/audio && cp -r src/audio/* build/audio && mkdir -p build/img && cp -r src/img/* build/img
